Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.receiver

Class DynamicColorsReceiver

java.lang.Object
android.content.BroadcastReceiver
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.receiver.DynamicColorsReceiver
@RestrictTo(LIBRARY_GROUP) public class DynamicColorsReceiver extends BroadcastReceiver
A BroadcastReceiver to listen color events.

It has been already added in the manifest and should be registered dynamically at runtime.
